JavaLog.debugger.hotpoints
Class SimpleHotpoint

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--JavaLog.debugger.hotpoints.Hotpoint
        |
        +--JavaLog.debugger.hotpoints.SimpleHotpoint
Direct Known Subclasses:
FunctorArityPoint, FunctorPoint
public abstract class SimpleHotpoint
extends Hotpoint

Implementa el comportamiento de un spypoint simple, es decir que no contiene hijos.

Version:
